name: Sean Nevin
bio: Poet and teacher Sean Nevin is the author of A House That Falls (2005), winner of the Slapering Hol Press Chapbook Competition, and Oblivio Gate (2008), awarded the Crab Orchard Award Series First Book Prize. Nevin has received fellowships from the Arizona Commission on the Arts and the National Endowment for the Arts. He directs the MFA Program in Poetry at Drew University.
